Package main.Spil.Model

Class FieldAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.Spil.Model.FieldAction
  • public class FieldAction
extends java.lang.Object
    The FieldAction is an argument used for the FieldActionListener, it encapsulates the state of the game and passes it on This allows ActionListeners to manipulate the state of the game
